content.detailedDescription: I was driving home from class and was on the 408w around exit 12 or 11 in orlando. (for those who don't know this route takes you thru the city of orlando on a kind of highrise highway). it was around 9:30pm and i was alone. i noticed a red shine reflecting off the buildings windows, about halfway up the buildings height my initial impression was that it must be some kind of promotional thing or maybe an ambulance reflecting as the light was pulsing. those thoughts were quickly gone when i saw what looked to be a red blood cell-looking object quickly floating from in between the two buildings! when i saw it, my thoughts were excited, as i have been intrigued by ufo's since i can remember, and here was one, maybe a mile away from me! then, without warning, it turned to its right(my left) and quickly glided over to my minivan that i was driving. as it flew over i noted how much it did look like a red blood cell. it had this plasma-like see-thru forcefield surrounding it and in the very center was a constantly glowing red ball, it would light up every other second and would make the entire plasma-like field around it glow a bright red. i did also notice that it didn't seem to reflect on the tree leaves, almost as if the plasma collected the light. it flew over, silently, to my van where it flew with my van for about a mile or two, right in front maybe about 15-25ft in front and slightly above the minivan's windshield. i would like to take a moment to point out the size of this object, which with plasma-like shield and all was no larger than my minivan. i'm watching this, i'm driving about 75mph on the highway and it must have been moving at the same speed because it stayed equidistant from me the entire time. after what seemed to be 1, maybe 2 minutes, the plasma-like substance surrounding it faded out and the red center ball spun to the left in a way that seemed internal but it created a yellowish sort of light that seemed more a result of the speed of its spin more than a color change, as the red color seemed to over-envelope it (almost as if the yellowish light was peek-a-booing thru it). i watched this spinning went on, and the spinning ball shape-shifted and grew wings with little lights underneath the tips of the wings, the left light was a white blinking, the right was a yellow blinking light. underneath the center of it was still the red blinking light. to tell it best it appeared to be a very small plane. only, it was no plane that i've ever encountered as it would have to be flying backward at 75mph. also, if you would, imagine the red blinking light in the center of it to be an axis of sorts, so while the rest of the "plane" was wobbly, the center remained in the same spot. i felt awed. i felt as if i were going crazy, i questioned my sanity. i remember i looked in my rearview mirror and all the cars that were around me were way back, almost slowed to a crawl, i also realized that no one was in front of me anymore. i guess people figured better me to handle it than have it come to their vehicle. i looked back at the ufo, it was still very much 15-25ft in front of me, still, as i felt, watching me i don't know why i felt that way, but it was like it was showing itself to me, showing me, "look what i can do". i did not feel threatened, and i certainly wasn't scared of it, it was almost in a sense, exciting. i was lucky to see this, so close. i felt what i was seeing was rare. and, i don't know if this will make any sense, but i felt like it was being coy or playing with me. i don't know why i feel that way, but it didn't hurt me nor anyone else and it left me feeling so pleasant at the end that is how i feel. i suppose now is the best time to say how i lost sight of this. as i was driving, there was a police cruiser with his lights flashing but no siren, he almost hit my minivan when he slid in between myself and the ufo. the ufo veered off to the right where there was a 10ish story brick building, it flew to the top window and produced a very bright white light and it flashed the window, seemingly peeking inside, and hovered there. i truly wish i could have stayed and watched but my drive home was long and i wouldn't get home till 10:30 as it were, so i drove home. i did note, however, that the police cruiser never pulled me, i was never contacted about it and i never saw anything about this on the news. i hope this information helps and, if you have any questions about what i have seen, feel free to contact me.
content.summary: Red pulsating blood cell ufo that shapeshifted at close proximity

content.detailedDescription:
on october 26, 2009 @ approximately 1545 eastern standard time, i stepped out on my back patio when i heard a jet flying over east to west to land @ a nearby airport 5 miles west of my house. i looked directly up to try and locate it when much to my surprise, i witnessed a spherical white object flying in a straight path of 330-340 degrees north to northwest @ a high rate of speed.
  the experience lasted approx. 3-4 seconds before it disappeared over the horizon. i'm guessing the altitude of the object was approx. 10,000-to 25,000 ft. because it flew beneath the few scattered cirrus clouds that were present. my first thought was that it was a satellite passing by, but i tried to rule that out because there was no glare from the sun which was starting to set to the southwest as well as traveling below the cirrus clouds. it also did not have a tail or debris field behind it, nor was there any light emittance that i could tell, which makes me want to rule out a meteor. the speed was much faster than a satellite which i have viewed hundreds of times yet slower than a meteor. 
  the best description as far as the size would be if i were to hold up cottonball or possibly a golfball with my arm fully extended.     
  for several years, f-16s would fly over our house on training runs at approx. 10-20,000 ft. and i could usually watch them fly over for a good 12-15 seconds at a probable speed of 400-600 mph.
  being an analytical person, i find this anomaly to be challenging and quite simply, the last thing i ever expected to see when i looked up. i'm trying to make comparisons to the f-16s, meteors, and satellites that i've viewed over the years and am completely stumped! 
  did anyone else witness this same event over central indiana or the midwest at that approximate time and date?
content.summary: White sphere traveling @ a high rate of speed 330 degrees nw

content.detailedDescription:
This object appeared out of the corner on my eye as a boomerang shape, roughly 1/2 degree across (the size of the full moon), moving from west to east.  it traveled at about the same speed as a conventional aricraft, but it was apparently very low (judging by it's speed) and did not make any sound what-so-ever. one would have expected some engine noise at such a low altitude. 

there were no aircrfaft lights visible through the entire journey across the sky.  i thought maybe otis air national guard base was receiving a stealth fighter.
content.summary: Flyning rather low overhead

content.detailedDescription:
It looked like a shooting star. but, went across the horizion

after a ball of light (with five to six) smallerballs of light coming and leaving the main sorce.
content.summary: Object went across the horizion.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving northbound on rt. 93 at approx 6:05am i saw what looked like a shooting star.  glancing upwards to get a closer look and maybe see another shooting star, to my surprise instead i saw a black triangle gliding southbound about 50 to 75 ft in the sky.  there were 3 circular lights on the bottom of the triangle which was equilateral in shape.  the 3 circles were glowing very dimly and were not radiating much light.  the triangle was very dark in color and i would have totally missed it if it wasn���t for the shooting star.  i believe that the shooting star may have actually come out of the triangle shaped object, but i can���t be sure since it happened so fast.
 a few other strange facts about what i witnessed:  the shooting star appeared to shoot sideways and even a little upward which i have never seen before with a shooting star.  also the same night about 15-20 minutes later i saw two bright "stars" to the bottom left of the constellation orion.  these stars seemed out of place and were pretty close to one another.  i tried keeping my eyes on the two stars but trees blocked my view since i was driving through a forested area.  once i broke past the forested area the two stars were gone.  this all happened within a 30 second period from first noticing the stars and to them disappearing.
i have to think that someone else must have seen this too since i was not the only vehicle on the highway at the time.
content.summary: Black flying triangle, weird stars

content.detailedDescription:
Last night saw a really yellow star and thought oh its just a plane over near tf green air port in rhode island or just thought it was a star but was out of place to me never seen one there before. well went and fed the horses and barn cats and when i came out the star seemed brighter so i watched it fro a second now thinking it was a low flying aircraft, well as it got closer it took shape it was a bright yellow triangle and it was moving extremely fast and as it passed over it was really big talking 50 to 70 yards front to back and 70 to 100 yards wide.

i wanted to run grab my camera but i feared it would be gone by time i got in and out of the house.

location sutton mass around 9:40pm est
content.summary: Bright yellow triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my balcony about 11pm last night when this blurry orange oval shape appreared on the southern hemisphere really high on the sky, first i thought it was a plane but after i saw its fast movement, i got really confused, don't know what it could of been, but it was bizarre!!!!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Blurry orange oval shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I have observed numerous ufo's from my house in the san fernando valley.  i therefore sometimes study the skys, knowing just how frequent these objects have appeared.  

on this particular day, i happened to notice a dot of light barely indistinguishable against the blue sky, traveling straight up at what appeared to be a slow rate, yet traveling a great distance just the same.  i waited for the object to rise up in front of the moon (visible in daylight, at this time) so that i could better see what i was looking at:

the object was, indeed, a sphere.  it traveled across the sky in a very peculiar way -- seeming to just float and glide sometimes with seemingly no defined path.  i ran inside the house to alert my brother, as he has observed these objects as well, and gave him my digital camera to record the object.

please note that these same objects have been so difficult to track with the naked eye in the past because of how high up they are.  however, because they are visible at all, especially against the moon, i would have to imagine that the objects themselves are quite sizeable (maybe 1/3 of a standard prop-plane or cessna).

therefore, the object in the attached video -- while clearly visible -- was ultimately only recorded for a brief amount of time, as it could not be seen on either the camera's screen, nor with the naked eye after such a point.  the object only appears so well-defined in the video because of the maximum-zoom feature on the camera.

the object seemed to be flashing red, but i do not believe this was from the reflection of the sun.  the flashing seemed to occur rhythmically, on a timed beat.

i have observed also a black sphere and white sphere next to one another in the same area, approximately two years ago, but which were not recorded.

these spheres seem to appear in clear skies and travel towards cloud formations, or, perhaps more appropriately, chemtrail dispersions.

the implications are quite clear: i do not believe that these are extra-terrestrial in origin, but rather deployed by the military to test the air quality at high altitudes.  the main implication, of course, being that the government is acutally employing technology in broad daylight that uses no discernable propulsion system and must therefore be some anti-gravity object/craft.

you may contact me by my e-mail if desired.
content.summary: Flashing, red orb traveling at high altitude

content.detailedDescription:
Attention--attention--cms administrator------this is a cms training report
and is not a real event-----this is to be used for demonstration purposes for mufon of georgia fis and fits.  please remove this report from cms in about two weeks--------------tom sheets, sd mufonga, 27oct09



my driver was taking me home tonight at 9:00pm.  he drove me east on strouds creek rd. and when we came to the intersection at county line rd. we saw it.  it was glowing, so i thought it was blimp with lights at first, but it was a round saucer like ufo.  it was headed toward us low over the trees real slow, about 200 feet up.  then it stopped and just hung in the air for about 45 seconds, then took off about 5 times faster than those jets the blue angels team fly at airshows.  it left a golden streak as it flew off out of sight back to the west behind the car. the streak then vanished in a few seconds.  we heard a sort of swishing sound and the car engine cut off.  i've never seen anything like it except on those shows on the history channel.  i was so shook up, i got out my flask of sour mash and we both had a stiff drink and then skint it for home. i called the sheriff, but he told me to just sleep it off and to remember to vote for him in the next election. i will be happy to talk to anyone in mufon that can tell me what happened!
content.summary: Glowing saucer slowly came low over the trees, hovered, then left at high speed leaving a streak

content.detailedDescription:
i was driving on my way home from work, and had just got on route 6 south in providence. it was about 4pm. almost as soon as i got on the highway i saw the object.It was a dark color and contasted against the blue sky. the object, as i first noticed reminded me of a large slab of rusted brown iron girder. the object appeared motionless the entire time i observed it. i pulled over in the breakdown lane, to get a better look. it appeared to be around 300ft off the ground. the sky was clear and there were no other objects near it to get a better perspective. the  object was rectangular was about 20ft long and 10 ft wide. i was about 300yds from the object.

the object looked like a slab of rusted iron girder.  however when i scanned the area below and near it, there was no crane, or equipment that could hoist that type of object.

as mesmerized, and curious as to what i was seeing, the hazardous position of being in the breakdown lane at rush hour, led me to stop watching and continue with my commute.

i felt confused about the object. after i felt that i ruled out other flying and hovering objects , as well as dirigible ( hood ice cream has one, and i,ve seen it, and this was not it. and when i saw there appeared to be nothing, no crane or other mechanical explanation, i was mysterfied. i remember i ran the event over and over in my mind trying to come up with an explanation, which i haven't yet found. i did not even consider the possibility of an ufo because i didn't think it fit any category of reported objects. i've never told anyone about this. a site on the internet sparked the memory of the experience. the time period that this took place was between 2000-2005. i realize that is a long time but unfortunately that is my only reference memory.
content.summary: Object floating 300ft up. rectangular in shape, rusty brown color.  it reminded me of a piece of a iron girder.

content.detailedDescription: In the late evening hours roughly 1 hour before sunset i was walking from my house to my car.  looking up above the treeline toward the east i saw a dc-10 passenger jet.  strangely tho she was solid black with no running lights and no identifiable markings.  her distance from me was about 1/4 mile and alt about 300 to 400ft.  unsettling truth she was at standard cruising speed about 220-250 knots and she made absolutely no noise.  i find the silence unsettling because i was a submariner sonar technician for the u.S. navy and have been trained to hear what can easily be missed.  the aircraft was traveling wnw through an area riddled with cell and base station towers most towers 300 to 600ft tall and a few 1500ft+ with guide lines for stability.  new stealth tech for military? smuggling? private enterprise?  these people had an intimate knowledge of the areas infrastructure.  i felt the persons onboard saw me and that i was not supposed to have seen them.  the hairs on the back of my neck stood up, not in fear, but anticipation for an upcoming confrontation with officials who would like to keep this event secret.  i lost sight of the aircraft as it passed beyond the western treeline.
content.summary: Silent  aircraft at low altitude of model dc-10 with no aparent malfunctions

content.detailedDescription: I was watching tv, i saw some weird lights, got my camera took this photo. this has not been edited or photoshopped in any way. was taken outside on my deck.
content.summary: Saturn like orb photo taken

content.detailedDescription:
on october 25th, 2009 at 9:02 p.M. i was the passenger in a two seat pickup truck driving eastbound down i-96 on my way to play a concert in ann arbor with my band dr. device. we had just passed the kensington valley shopping center and were in in the howell area. as we passed datapak services inc. on our left, myself (passenger) and the driver of the truck noticed 5 distinct and strangely luminous green balls in the sky. initially we thought they were lights attached to a radio tower (which in itself was of note, as we drive this route often at night and in daylight and have never noticed such a tower), but soon we visually confirmed they were actually independent objects moving and hovering above the buildings to our left and further toward the westbound side of i-96.  they appeared incredibly low in altitude and of good size, no more than 100ft above the treeline(probably more like 50ft), and well under the scattered broken clouds that were strewn about the sky. there was light rain at the time. they seemed to be very slowly traveling west in a symmetrical trajectory. we we're only to observe these what i would call craft for 1 minute as we drove out of site of them, but we made the following observations: 

- they made no sound 
- no faa or blinking lights
- moved in formation rectangular formation but also, 
- displayed independent movement at one time
- changed color from green to red
- witnessed 4 minutes later by 2 people we knew, who were only a few 
  miles  behind us on i-96 en route to the same location

more details:
we observed the first three (from left to right) change colors from green to red in a blink of an eye. this revealed to me what seemed to actually be 5 solid cylindrical or rectangular shaped craft.It seemed the green light was on one end of the craft, then would change (better described visually as morph)to the other end and become red (maybe the craft was rotating 180 degrees quickly). never did any of them have both color lights on at one time. the colored lights didn't emanate, refract off the windshield, or blink like the other lights we are used to seeing in the night sky, they were soft and glowing bright but not lighting up the surrounding sky, clouds, buildings or ground below. the fourth in succession remained green, and as i watched the fifth it turned to red and dipped down and moved westward as the still green craft (fourth) moved straight across east; the first three maintained their trajectory. after this they seemed to re-assume a symmetrical flight path, it was at this point i lost sight as we drove further east down i-96. the last thing seen by the driver was that the crafts were solid and dark on the bottom, while a bit lighter on their topside with the aforementioned light on the end (seemingly round). at this point i called to our friends trailing us by a few minutes down i-96e and they we're already having an identical sighting. the driver of the truck i was riding in previously did not believe there was any credence to the ufo phenomena, and this event has his beliefs completely reversed, as it was quite amazing.
content.summary: 5 green balls of light floating over datapak services and western i-96 as we travelled eastbound. lights changed to red revealing vague yet solid cylindrical or rectangualr shape

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back patio when i saw a string of lights against the starlit clear night sky. i heard, or rather felt a low vibration and dull humming sound. as i looked closer i saw a boomerang shape aircraft moving slowly about 1000 to 1500 ft in the air. it was moving too low and slow for its size (about 200 yards from end to end). it had no landing lights, but it did have interior lights that shone through rectangular windows which ran from one end of the boomerang to the other. there was no fuselage or tail section. the event happened quickly as the aircraft passed out of my line of sight. my apartment building was in the way. i ran to the parking area and looked up to where i thought the aircraft should be, and it was simply gone. i live across the street from and old martin-marietta aeronotics campus in littleton, and the aircraft was actually traveling in the direction of the existing lockeed martin plant. my speculation is that it was a version of the b-2 stealth aircraft. it was certainly stealthy, and had a black almost fluid quality to the texture of the exterior. it almost blended in with the night sky. i was not firightend by the sighting, but at the time it was quite surprising. i'm sure my blood pressure went up a few notches.
content.summary: I saw the lights first then felt the vibration and dull humm. looked up and there it was.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and his friend were driving from lansing to ann arbor to play a concert at the blind pig.My friend and i left 10 minutes after them following the same route heading to ann arbor, my boyfriend had called us multiple times to tell us that he just saw green disc shaped objects on the highway heading the opposite direction but we didn't hear the call because our music was up. then we realized that he was calling and picked up the phone and just at that moment we saw the green lights right in front of us hovering but moving slowly directly above us, we told him they were right above us and he said he saw them 5 min before we did they were floating in perfect symmetry perfectly spaced apart and flying toward the trees. we watched them float in front of us then over our car then about 100feet above the trees we watched them for ten min in the review mirror until they floated out of sight. they made no sound and floated in such symmetry i don't think any plane or helicopter could be so precisely symmetrical in floating together. when i noticed the orbs i looked at the clock imediatly and tracked the time the whole sighting, as far as i'm concerned i have never seen lights morph like that or that shape of a vehicle in the sky. three other people can tell you the same story. there was a lot of traffic and a semi pulled over watching this happen. i wouldn't doubt others have reported  this sighting. it was like nothing i have ever saw. we tried to snap a picture but in the shock we were in we took the picture in the car and the glare may have impared the picture but if it turns out when we develope the film i will post it. it had rained that night but stopped.
content.summary: 5 to 6 green morphing to red disc shaped objects flying in perfect sequence perfectly spaced aqnd traviling in a slanted rectangle formation above the highway 96 and then moving toward the trees about 100 feet above the trees

content.detailedDescription: It was 2:30am saturday night (sunday morning) and my boyfriend took the dogs out in rhe back yard one last time before we went to bed and then called me outside to look at a "ufo" i was like yeah right whatever, but when outside and he pointed up and this bright light in the sky i looked and told him it was an airplane, (it initally looked liked the headlight of a oncoming jet) but a kept watching and it was not moving, it was hovering and it was shimmering or sparkling like a star, but was different from anything i ever saw.  stood there for a minute or two and decided to go get the binoculars and told my boyfriend to stay there and watch it, i ran in and got the binoculars and when we looked in the binoculars it was the weirdest thing either of us had ever seen, it was a multi colors bouncing or hovering around in the sky, very hard to describe cause i have never seen anything like it.  we were both shocked, and just could not beleive what we were seeing!  we stayed out there watching and it seemed like it was getting further away and then it was gone instantly.  i was excited, nervous and scared all at once.  i got on the internet tried to search other sightings similar to ours, i have been obsessed ever since the sighting trying to get an answer as to what it was.  we decided to go back out there one last time before getting into bed and it was back, but in a different location, looked through binoculars and saw same thing.  very strange.
content.summary: Saw a bright white light hovering got binoculars and and through binoculars saw multi colors shimmering and hovering and then it seemed to be getting further away and just a few seconds it was gone!

content.detailedDescription:
Prior to january 31, 2009 i had a healthy interest in ufo���s.  i watched ufo hunters religiously and every other tv show that might be on regarding the subject.  but that was pretty much it.  that all changed at 9:00 pm monday night the 31st of january, 2009.  i was watching the bachelor, the jason/molly fiasco.  we have a large window which is to my left.  we live in the country in northern california, so we���re talking relatively dark.  a new moon reported on january 26 with a quarter moon on february 2nd.  so we���re in the middle���. what i���m trying to say is it wasn���t pitch dark outside.

as i���m watching tv, out of the corner of my eye to my left hand side i see what i can only describe as a big round whitish-yellow light.  it ���dips��� down so i can���t help but see it.  needless to say, i was startled.  i couldn���t imagine what could possibly be that large, only 15��� away from my window moving in the air!  i���ve been struggling with how to describe it, but it was about the size of a tire.  we have two yellow labs,  both jumped up when i jumped out of my seat.  i don���t recall them barking, they just got excited, because i was excited.  still unaware of what the heck i was dealing with (a helicopter?) i went to the front door which was directly behind my chair.  i went out to the covered porch, down the stairs and looked immediately to my left and up.

i still have trouble wrapping my mind around what i saw that night.  but here goes���.. i���m hard of hearing, but the first thing i did was check to see if my hearing aid was in my ear, because i heard no sound, but, there was a definite electrical buzz/feeling in the air.  as i turned to my left and looked up i saw directly above tree level, perhaps 40 feet a craft.  it was floating, best way to describe it, floating forward very slowly, perhaps 5-10 miles an hour.  by the time that i was able to get outside, down the stairs, and was able to observe it, only the back end of the craft was visible to me.  it was, and still is the most incredible thing i have ever seen.  it was a real space ship.  it was definitely metallic, burnished kind of metal.  white, blue, red lights adorned the back of the craft.  because i only saw the back end of it i���d say the size of it was a big car.  not as big as i would have imagined (had i thought about it at all).  as it floated over my house it continued over the trees and was lost from my sight.  

from that night to this day i have become totally immersed, via the internet, in finding out everything i can about ufo���s.  i���m a daily mufon reader.  trying to find out if anybody else had a similar sighting.  what excites me and frightens me at the same time is that the ship made a point of ���knocking��� on my door, i.E. coming down to less than 15 feet from the ground and shining the light in my window to get my attention.  it wanted me to know about and become involved with ufo���s and the only way to do that was by doing something dramatic.  my husband works in the city but i called him, after i recovered sufficiently, to let him know what happened.  it���s been hard for him to grasp, but i���m a level headed 58 year old woman and he believes in me.  a few close friends know but i don���t really talk about it with anyone anymore.  i didn���t tell my story until now because, well������. same old story���. who���s gonna believe you?  if you harp on it too much, you become ���weird���.  thank goodness for the internet.  few days after this happened i went and bought binoculars and a camera.
content.summary: January 31, 2009 sighting in northern california

content.detailedDescription: Please call .Not good at typing.
content.summary: Seven total first saw was many flashing lites.Went outside,saw additional six red disks in half mile area. watched disks and they changed shape to round and diferant texture.At one point had holes ant spining top shape. third sighting this month ,first on

content.detailedDescription: I was leaving on my way back to school. i got on the interstate at the irish rd. exit at about 9:20 pm. i noticed light out of the corner of my left eye, so i looked in that direction. when i first looked at it i thought it might be one of those lights that are used at concerts, or big events [the kind that sort of criss cross in a sense]. as i continued to watch i noticed that it was four opaque lights that were tear-dropped shape, but they had darker white circles in the center of them. the lights would come together in a center and immediately bounce back out. once they hit about 50 ft out in each direction they would come back and repeat the process. the lights as a whole were also rotating at a relatively slow pace. after about five more minutes i realized that there was no way this was from a light because it had been moving parallel to my car ( about 100 - 200 ft. up)for about 10 minutes. the object made no noise, and seemed much too large to be any form of aircraft. [it was about 100 ft x 100 ft.] i thought it was the coolest thing ever, and i immediately called my dad after my realization because we are obsessed with this sort of thing. after another 5 minutes or so it started making it's way further left over the woods, and i lost sight of it. it was definitely the most amazing thing i've ever seen.
content.summary: Ufo sighting over i-69 towards lansing between irish rd. and shwartz creek.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were camping in big thicket on the turkey creek trail. we were laying on the ground looking up into the sky while there was plenty of daylight left. there were no clouds in the sky so we could see very clearly. as we were looking up we saw a red neon boomerang appear and disappear maybe 5 times in a southern direction. it was traveling from the north. we were on the southern half of the trail a couple miles shy of the halfway mark. i have no idea what it was but i know that i have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Solid neon red boomerang

content.detailedDescription: I was too far away to see any details of the object. when i first saw the object i thought "oh there is a blimp" but i have never seen a blimp anywhere in the sky before. i called the airport and they had no information about any blimps in or around the area. weird.
content.summary: Blimp shaped grey in color

content.detailedDescription: I watched a light come closer to where i was parked at boat meadow at eastham from 7pm to 8pm.I missed the sunset by a few minutes.I stayed in my truck and watched the sky as it was a grand array of colors.As dusk approached and the sky became darker i watched this yellowish light move side to side up and down and not appear to get any closer.Meanwhile there was only two other cars there.One of the cars a young lady was phographing the sunset,with a camera mounted on a tripod,in front of me.I got out of my truck and as the light i had seen was alot closer now.I got a little scarred,i relized it was a ufo,as i have seen one up close when i was younger.I asked the younglady what did she think we were watching?She said,"a ufo"."i said your right",aren"t you scarred?She said nothing,i said i was.Now i could make out the outline and shape of this craft.I saw two lights one yellowish and the other white on each side.It was shaped like a large triangle and emitted no noise.A tow truck driver showed up with a flatbed.One of the cars would not start.I asked the tow truck driver what he thought we were watching?He agreed it was a ufo".I decided to get a friend of mine and share this sighting.He lived 5to7 minutes away and was staying in his fishing shack.When we got back i asked the girl with the camera if she got a picture of the craft?She showed me and i saw the lights and shape.But not as clear as i had seen with my eyes.I asked her her name.She told me it was amber,and i told her to contact mufon and to send me a photo to my email.I have been waiting.Meanwhile my friend saw the lights as they went back over the bay.An interesting and a bit scarry experience.Sincerely,amn
content.summary: After watching sunset, i saw a yellowish non blinking light cresting the water and the horizen.

content.detailedDescription: Looking west from ne alberta area, just past dusk, saw first one, then several more pink lights rising upwards.  first four formed square shape, then two more followed.  they were not blinking, pink in color, did not veer off course, so were not flares or fireworks. they just kept rising up and up until they faded into the clouds.  best rationale was that they were police helicopters - there is the killingsworth station in the general area they appeared to be from, but does portland even have 6 helicopters? and at less than 1.5 miles away, wouldn't i have heard 6 helicopters? and wouldn't the lights be blinking instead of constant? and how would they climb so high as to disappear on a relatively clear night....They rose slowly enough i had time to wake up girlfriend, she saw them as well.  wish i had thought to grab the cell phone camera.
content.summary: Multiple pink lights rising slowly until fading into atmosphere.

content.detailedDescription: Smoking outside, looking at the night sky, i am near the local airport, and flight paths are near and over my house...Saw this brilliant light, star like, a deep almost sparkling ruby color, like a star, that moved below the tree line. it moved slowly and would appear to stop at times and would do a jerking erratic almost light displacement movement as i watched it..;it seemed to be going in a pattern, but a tight one, at first i thought it was a star, then knew it was too low and close, then a plane, with brilliant lights, colors more vivid and deep than i have ever seen, but it seemed impossible because it would shift directions, not turn, and then there was the displacement thing...Then considered if it were a helicopter, but helicopters that i have seen rarely move like this if ever, and the colors, the displacement, moving from left to right on an even plane, then stopping moving right to left without skipping a beat...It seemed to go in a pattern, as if scanning or searching the area...It could not have been any more than 10 miles south of me at the most...It would do pretty much the same thing, move east behind the trees, then shortly come back west into my vision, then there were two brilliant white lights that flashed, and they were super bright, at first two then each one would flash taking turns and very fast and then the ruby red lights, a circle, or star type shape...When i watched it it did the same thing over and over, i kept telling myself, "you have got to be kidding" i am not sure how long this actually went on for because i really couldn't reconcile what i was seeing with anything i know about or have seen before... i actually got my digital camera out, but could not get a pic of it, the camera is not a good one the zoom is very very short, and does not take night pics well...I could not find it, or see in on the screen, no matter how i tried to find it with the camera...A roommate came home while i was still out there, he had a few friends with him, i wanted someone else to see it, and made him wait until it went behind the tree line and came back...They looked at me like i was nuts, he looked at it, they glanced, and he was not interested, said it could be anything, a plane...He wouldn't sit there to watch it more, he barely looked at it, he said he saw something but what it was, could be anything,then they went in...At that point i felt a little crazed, i had been watching this for awhile in disbelief and they just glance at it and go inside, no interest...I had to ask him if he saw it to get a reality check just in case i have gone bonkers...I have no agenda, to want to see any ufo's, in fact the thought of ufo's, as in, out of this world, alien technology, etc.. kind of freaks me out...I have seen a couple of objects with and confirmed by the people i was with years ago, that had no explanation but were much further away than this object...I went back outside later around 10 minutes and saw a plane come from behind the tree line i had last observed the object move behind. the plane seemed to be small, like ultra lite, i could hear it, from the point where i last saw the strange object.. i  could not  hear a thing as i observed the strange bright brilliant ruby red object..The small plane was not brilliant or bright, you could see the typical plane lights, i don't even remember seeing a tale light on the plane, and you could hear that it had a single small engine.. but i still blew the incident off as optical illusion, too much imagination, etc, i was embarrassed by my roommates reaction to my observation, even though he didn't bother to even watch it long enough to see how unusual it was...There is something totally intimidating about seeing the unusual alone, and then when i was trying to get someone else to observe, it was discounted without any real authority or observation... so anyway all day long this has bothered me a lot, i blew it off to maybe being the airplane, but still if i could believe my eyes and ears, it still didn't make sense to me...I am not sure what it was, it bugs me that i am not sure, not convinced of it being anything...Do want to call the local airport, that is less than 2 miles away to ask for any explanation, of the lights i saw...Experimental craft, optical illusions, what????  this bothered me all day, it is too strange, not to question, doesn't make any logical sense it doesn't fit in to any thing i have seen..I see large  and small aircraft of all kinds day and night in the skies  above and around the area. i live close to a small airport, 50 miles or less from major airports, major army, air force,  and navy military bases..The description of this object is very very close to the description of "event 20115" for 10/25/09 in austin tx, very strange, it seems like he/she is describing almost exactly what i watched, what are the odds????...How could i be the only person in this region to see this event it went on long enough for many people to see, but you would have to be a sky watcher, which most people rarely bother to look at anymore...
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Brilliant ruby red object below tree line south, moved west behind trees, then east in site, erratic slow moving..

content.detailedDescription: It was early one sunday morning just as the sun was peaking over the hills to my east while driving north on i 684. it was looking like to shape up to be a beautful spring morning with hardly a cloud in the sky. i was approaching a section of the highway where byram lake is directly adjacent to the southbound lanes when i noted what looked like a strange flickering shining cell tower in the middle of the lake.It was in the shape of a giant stylized cross with what looked like sharp leading edges and tapered to points at the ends of the arms. it looked really strange when the rising sun peaked over the hills adjacent and i noted these sherical mylar ballon like objects moving up and down out of the water. of course my curiosity was peaked so at this point i put on my flashers, slowed my car and moved onto the left shoulder of the road until i got a clear view between the trees. being springtime and the leaves hadn't opened yet on the trees. this cross object was 300 or more feet in height with the arms about 200 feet wide and hovering about 10 feet off the water. i got out of my car, i was viewing this thing from about a quarter mile in distance. its surface was highly reflective and reflecting the topography around it, if it weren't for the bright morning sun reflecting it would have been nearly invisible. i watched a few minutes as about a dozen of these shiny sherical balls kind of floated in and out of the water, some appeared to be dripping water as they rose up slowly from the lake. they appeared to be about 7 to 10 feet in diameter. they just sort of floated up slowly meandering to either the vertical or horizontal arm of the cross and just looked like they melded onto them. the surface of the cross looked perfectly smooth, no humps, bumps or any apertures were noted prior to the spheres appearance or disappearence onto the surface. a few cars had passed in the meantime when this black bronco pulled onto the shoulder in front of me and the driver got out to also look. we both sort of looked on in silent amazement when after another 30-40 seconds the cross just rose straight up into the air, as if being pulled by a tether line at ever increasing speed and dissappeared into the stratosphere. there was absolutely no sound to be heard from the object even as it was ascending at what had to be faster than sound speed. i said to the guy driving the bronco " can you believe that?" he looked at me and said" i don't know about you, but i'm not telling anyone they'll think we're crazy!" he hopped in his vehicle put on his blinker and drove away. well i know i'm not crazy, maybe a little twisted like most, but i've never heard of an object like this described before and i've been a skeptical believer since project blue book days. i am an air force veteran with flight experience as well as a respected health care professional and think i'm eminently qualified to discern an illusion, delusion or hallucination from reality!
content.summary: Shiny cross shaped ufo directly over lake off interstate 684

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to visit a friend in yorktown heights off granite springs road. prior to making the right turn i noticed this grouping of triangular lights coming out of the west from the direction of the taconic state parkway. at first i didn't think anything of it as westchester county airport was to the east of me and i assumed that it was an aircraft on approach. than it dawned on me that the light configuation was all wrong and this object was either large or extremely low flying. i am a usaf veteran and know the standard light configurations of militay and civilian aircraft. after making the turn onto granite springs i pulled my car to the shoulder and got out for a better look. by this time the object was headed right for my location and getting larger by the second. when the leading edge was directly above me i noticed the lights on the edge to be evenly spread approximately 30 yards apart. the object appeared to be 500 to 700 feet above the ground traveling at about 40 knots. from tip to tip i estimate its width to have been 300 to 350 yards. other than the lights on its leading edge it was jet to muted black with no discernible structural features. once directly above me it completely blocked out my north and south horizons. no sky or stars were visible except beyond the leading edge. i heard a low pitched modulating motorized sound, nothing like an aircraft engine more like an electrical turbine but muffled. i followed the crafts flight after it passed me continuing east for a few minutes and noted two bright lights coming out of the southwest and heard the distinctive sound of two f4 phantoms at about 5 to 7000 feet descending and headed towards the object. as the jets on descent were about a mile away from the object its lights just sort of flashed and it completely disappeared from the sky. some weeks later i read a newspaper article about this object they called the westchester wing which speculating that it was a hoax perpetuated by a group of ultralight pilots. if there was any truth in that, they must have been the greatest pilots on the face of the planet and had perfectly tuned ,synchronized and muffled their engines. there would have to have been 50 or more of them flying wingtip to wing tip and nose to tail and maintaing the exact altitude and attitude in the moonless dark during my sighting of 15 or more minutes. a feat i know to be aerodynamically impossible for an ultralight.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object with bright lights on leading edge.

content.detailedDescription: Everyone said they heard a boom and that their homes had shook. i called 911 and they had no information. i also called the local t.V. news station and the woman at the news desk ,told me that i was the first person to call and that she had heard something, but she thought it had been their heating.
content.summary: Never saw anything , but a loud boom shook the entire house. i went outside to find that several of our neighbors had also gone outside.

content.detailedDescription:
At 10:15 pm i was out walking, when i spotted what i thought was a helicopter flying west of my position at about 1000 feet. it had a large bright orange/yellow light in front, with a faint white strobe in the rear. after watching fly slowly around for about 2 minuets, i noticed 4 or 5 more craft flying around in the same manner west, and south west of my position, about 5 miles away. it was at this point that i realized that what i was seeing was not helicopters because there was no noise whatever being made by the craft, and what would a squad of helicopters be doing flying around randomly in the middle of the night? there is only one police helicopter in the area, and the light are nothing like these. a helicopter with lights that is flying around at night will have lights that fade, and change shape and size as it turns. these lights did not change shape as the vehicles turned, they remained large orange/yellow balls of light, with a faint white strobe at the rear. as i contined to observe the vehicle closest to me, which was now south sout west of my position, and about 4 miles away, the vehicle turned, it turned off it's yellow light, turned on a bright red strobe in the front, and the faint white strobe on the rear became very bright. then, it started to fly slowly twoards my position, and then all of the lights went out, and the whole vehicle was illuminated bright red, as if a hat had been put in the air and covered with small bright red lights. it appeared to be flying twaords me and ascending at the same time, then, it stopped forward movement and slowly went streight up. it flew streight up slowly as if on an elivator. in about 30 seconds i watched it penetrate the lowest cloud layer. it flew through that into a small clear space, then into the next cloud layer, where it dissappeared for good. all without sound, and streight up, up, up. not a helicopter after all. 
i then looked around to see what happened with the rest of the craft that were flying around. i spotted one south of me, flying slowly dead east, and still an illuminated ball of orange/yellow light. i also spotted another craft that was quite a bit closer to me and directly west, now illuminated in a cigar shape with blue, white, and red lights running along it's length in 3 or 4 separate rows, flying slowly north north west.
i watched this vehicle until it flew out of range of sight behind the tree line, a matter of 3 or 4 minuets, and continued with my walk. when i turned the corner and started walking down the street heading east, i spotted the final craft flying dead east, just south of me, about 5 miles away. it was still an orange/yellow ball with a faint white strobe at the back. s i watched it fly east, it continued flying 5 or so miles, and just shut off all of it's lights, at which point it dissappeared from view. total duration of sightings was 23 minuets. the weather was cool and crisp, low 40's, very clear, low to no wind, and partly cloudy and quiet. the clouds were very high, broken in spots, and in two layers.
i was completely surprised by the one that turned red and ascended streight up. at one poing i thought it was flying twoards me, and i would finally get a good look at what the heck this thing was. but instead, it flew streight up and away, all without a sound, or deviation in flight path because of winds, which must be quite high, as it flew right through the jet stream.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Six ufo's - large bright orange/yellow balls of light. one turned fully red and ascended streight up.
